1.1.0.name: wordpress/athlon-manage-calameo-publications
1.1.0.description:
This plugin allows managing Calameo account(s) through WordPress. It gives users the ability to upload documents to Calameo and update or delete them afterwards. Once a document is uploaded its preview can be easily embedded into blog posts or pages using the custom "Calameo" button in the WYSIWYG text editor. WP Calameo plugin must be installed in order to use Athlon Manage Calameo Publication plugin's all features.

http://www.athlonproduction.com/
